name: Sandra L. FEIGLEY, Appellant, v. PENNSYLVANIA DEPARTMENT OF CORRECTIONS, Appellee
name_abbreviation: Feigley v. Pennsylvania Department of Corrections

parties: Sandra L. FEIGLEY, Appellant, v. PENNSYLVANIA DEPARTMENT OF CORRECTIONS, Appellee.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM
AND NOW, this 20th day of January 1999, we AFFIRM the Order of the Commonwealth Court.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM

casebody.head_matter:
722 A.2d 684
Sandra L. FEIGLEY, Appellant, v. PENNSYLVANIA DEPARTMENT OF CORRECTIONS, Appellee.
